maqras.text: akasam braddalayi poyinappudu
mariyu adi tana prabhuvu adesapalana cesindi mariyu ade dani vidhyukta dharmam
mariyu bhumi vistarimpajeyabadi (cadunuga ceyabadi) nappudu
mariyu adi tana lopala unnadanta bayatiki visarivesi, khali ayinappudu
adi tana prabhuvu adesapalana cesindi mariyu ade dani vidhyukta dharmam
o manavuda! Niscayanga, nivu ni prabhuvu vaipunaku, ni (manci-cedu) karmalanu tisukoni maralutunnavu, oka niscita maralpu. Appudu nivu ni (karmala phalitanni) pondutavu
appudu tana karmapatram kudicetilo ivvabadinavadi nundi
atani lekka ati telikaga tisukobadagaladu
mariyu atadu santosanga tana vari daggaraku maralipotadu
ika tana karmapatram vipu venuka nundi ivvabadinavadu
appudatadu tana nasananne - korukuntadu
mariyu atadu mandutunna narakagnilo padipotadu
vastavaniki, atadu (prapancanlo) tana vari madhya sukhasantosalalo munigi undevadu
vastavaniki, atadu (ma vaipuku) maraliradani bhavincevadu
ala kadu! Vastavaniki, atani prabhuvu atanini gamanistu undevadu
kanuka, nenu sandhyakalapu erupu saksiga cebutunnanu
ratri saksiga, adi progu cesevati saksiga
purnacandruni saksiga
mirandaru tappanisariga oka sthiti nundi maroka sthitiki kramakramanga marutu povalasi untundi
ayite viri kemayindi? Viru enduku visvasincaru
Mariyu khur'an viri mundu pathimpabadinappudu virenduku sastangam (sajda) ceyaru
ala kadu! I satyatiraskarulu dinini asatyamantunnaru
mariyu varu kudabettedanta allah ku baga telusu
kabatti variki (paralokanlo) labhince vyadhabharitamaina siksa yokka vartanivvu
visvasinci satkaryalu cese variki tappa - variki ennatiki antam gani pratiphalam untundi
vistaramaina taraganam gala akasam saksiga
vagdanam ceyabadina (punarut'thana) dinam saksiga
cucedani (dinam) mariyu cudabade dani (dinam) saksiga
agni kandakam (ukhud) varu nasanam ceyabaddaru
indhananto tivranga mande agnini rajesevaru
varu dani (a kandakam) ancupai kurconi unnappudu
mariyu tamu visvasula patla cese ghora karyalanu (sajiva dahanalanu) tilakincevaru
mariyu varu visvasula patla kasi pencukovadaniki karanam - varu (visvasulu) sarvasaktimantudu, sarva stotralaku ar'hudaina - allah nu visvasincadam matrame
ayane! Evarikaite bhumyakasala adhipatyam undo! Mariyu allah ye pratidaniki saksi

evaraite visvasulaina purusulanu mariyu visvasulaina strilanu hinsistaro, a taruvata pascattapanto ksamapana koraro! Niscayanga, alanti variki narakasiksa untundi. Mariyu variki mande narakagni siksa vidhincabadutundi
niscayanga, visvasinci satkaryalu cesevari koraku krinda selayellu pravahince svargavanaluntayi. Ade goppa vijayam
niscayanga, ni prabhuvu yokka pattu (siksa) cala kathinamainadi
niscayanga, ayane (srstini) arambhincevadu mariyu ayane (danini) marala unikiloki teccevadu
mariyu ayana ksamasiludu, amita vatsalyudu
sinhasananni (ars nu) adhistincina vadu, mahattvapurnudu
tanu talacindi ceyagalavadu
Emi? Sain'yala vari samacaram niku andinda
phir'aun mariyu samud vari (sain'yala)
ala kadu, satyatiraskarulu (satyanni) tiraskarincutalo nimagnulai unnaru
mariyu allah varini venuka (prati dikku) nundi cuttumutti unnadu
vastavaniki, idi oka divyamaina khur'an
suraksitamaina phalakam (lauhe mah phuj) lo (vrayabadi) unnadi
akasam mariyu ratrivela vacce naksatram (at tarikh) saksiga
ratri vela vaccedi (at tarikh) ante emito niku ela telustundi
adoka atyanta prakasavantamaina naksatram
kanipettukoni undevadu (devaduta) lekunda e vyakti kuda ledu
kavuna manavudu tanu denito srstincabaddado gamanincali
atadu visarjincabade (cim'mukuntu veluvade) dravapadarthanto srstincabaddadu
adi vennu mariyu rom'mu emukala madhyabhagam nundi bayatiki vastundi
niscayanga, ayana (srstikarta), atanini marala bratikinci tegala samarthyam galavadu
e rojayite rahasya visayala vicarana jarugutundo
appudu ataniki (manavuniki) elanti sakti undadu mariyu e sahayakudunu undadu
varsam kuripince akasam saksiga
(cetlu molakettetappudu) cili poye bhumi saksiga
niscayanga, idi (i khur'an, satyasatyalanu) veru parace vakku (giturayi)
mariyu idi vrtha kalaksepaniki vaccinadi kadu
(o muham'mad!) Niscayanga, varu (niku virud'dhanga) kutrapannutunnaru
mariyu nenu kuda pannagam pannutunnanu
kanuka nivu satyatiraskarulaku konta vyavadhi nivvu! Vari patla mrduvuga vyavaharincu
